DESCRIPTION: Name of the plot where data was collected
Direction of transect recorded (N, S, E, W)
Segment of each transect where observations are recorded (5 segments recorded every 5 meters of each transect)
Time stamp for successful upload of data collected
Header for each height class for vegetation height observations for each segment
Observed canopy gaps >1m; TRUE = canopy gap present, FALSE = no canopy gap present
Observed basal gaps >1m; TRUE = basal gap present, FALSE = no basal gap present
Observed count of species 1 (species determined by user on plot by plot basis)
Observed count of species 2 (species determined by user on plot by plot basis)
Documented species names of interest (determined by user)
All observed cover elements at segment 1 of the respective transect
All observed cover elements at segment 2 of the respective transect
All observed cover elements at segment 3 of the respective transect
All observed cover elements at segment 4 of the respective transect
All observed cover elements at segment 5 of the respective transect
Total count of all bare ground observations for the respective transect
Total count of all trees observations for the respective transect
Total count of all shrubs observations for the respective transect
Total count of all sub-shrubs observations for the respective transect
Total count of all perennial grass observations for the respective transect
Total count of all annual grasses and forbs observations for the respective transect
Total count of all herbaceous litter observations for the respective transect
Total count of all woody litter observations for the respective transect
Total count of all rock fragment observations for the respective transect
Percent of ground covered by plants, litter or rock (calculation = # points of any cover type/total number of points)
Percent of ground not covered by plants, litter and rock (calculation = # points bare ground/total # points)
Percent cover of all plant elements combined (calculation = # points with any plant/total # points)
Percent cover of trees (calculation = # points with trees/total # points)
Percent cover of shrubs (calculation = # points with shrubs/total # points)
Percent cover of sub-shrubs (calculation = # points with sub-shrubs/total # points)
Percent cover of perennial grasses (calculation = # points with perennial /total # points)
Percent cover of annual grasses and forbs (calculation = # points with annual grasses and forbs/total # points)
Percent of plants in <10 cm height class (calculation = # points in <10cm height class/total # points)
Percent of plants in 10-50 cm height class (calculation = # points in 10-50 cm height class/total # points)
Percent of plants in 50cm-1m height class (calculation = # points in 50cm-1m height class/total # points)
Percent of plants in 1-2m height class (calculation = # points in 1-2m height class/total # points)
Percent of plants in 2-3m height class (calculation = # points in 2-3m height class/total # points)
Percent of plants in >3m height class (calculation = # points in >3m height class/total # points)
Percent of ground occurring in large gaps (>1m) between plant canopies (calculation = # points with canopy gap/total # points)
Percent of ground occurring in large gaps (>1m) between plant bases (calculation = # points with basal gap/total # points)
The number of individual plant species 1 per plot (calculated per m squared; calculation = # individual plants observed of the species of interest/per square m in the sample area)
The number of individual plant species 2 per plot (calculated per m squared; calculation = # individual plants observed of the species of interest/per square m in the sample area)
